title: Can we please change 4/1 surrender votes to 3/2 surrender votes?
body:
I don't know why it's been decided that 1 person out of 5 gets overruled but 2 people out of 5 don't.

Why are the opinions of 2 people outweighing those of 3? A majority is a majority, that's the way it works in real life. Whether you own 99% of a company's shares or 51% of a company's shares makes no difference. Why is a duo able to overrule 3 other people?

If 3 of the team of 5 don't want to continue the game, they should be allowed to end it
